titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor, aldermen, and citizens of London at St. Lawrence Jewry, on the feast of St. Michael, 1698, at the election of the Lord Mayor for the year ensuing / by Samuel Barton ...
titleStmt.author: Barton, Samuel, 1647 or 8-1715.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
